scripts.clean:all: rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf packages/*/node_modules && rm -rf apps/*/node_modules && rm -rf agents/*/node_modules && rm -rf services/*/node_modules && rm -rf .cache && rm -rf packages/*/.cache && rm -rf apps/*/.cache && rm -rf agents/*/.cache && rm -rf services/*/.cache && rm -rf .turbo && rm -rf packages/*/.turbo && rm -rf apps/*/.turbo && rm -rf agents/*/.turbo && rm -rf services/*/.turbo
scripts.reset: pnpm run clean:all && pnpm install && pnpm run build
